name: motif market tote
sizes_available: one size: 12.75" w x 12.5" h  (not including strap)
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern & all photo tutorials, in one printable file without advertisements.

beginners and seasoned crocheters alike will enjoy crocheting the simple granny squares used to create the motif market tote. the visual interest created by the openwork in the design makes it the perfect market tote for spring and summer. crochet 13 granny squares for your bag and seam them together to form a fun granny square bag! this crochet market tote pattern will be a fun challenge for advanced beginners and it will keep experienced crocheters from losing interest.

**yarn:** i used lion brand 24/7 cotton yarn for my bag.

this paid pdf includes includes all written instructions, ad-free.

[**purchase the kit here! (aff)**][2] lion brand also has a full kit of the motif market tote bag pattern, available on their website. the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern.

granny square tote bag is an a crocheted simplicity original design.

join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases, giveaways, sales and testing opportunities: https://www.facebook.com/groups/906744872727855/

you can also find me on etsy (a crocheted simplicity).

all of my patterns are written in standard american terms, unless noted otherwise.

please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds, however, i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions.
